title: The End of Privacy | Guests: Rep. Chris Stewart & Bill O’Reilly | 5/15/20
description:
Are Washington state’s newest coronavirus rules straight out of Nazi Germany or the book of Revelation? Rep. Chris Stewart joins to discuss what he knew three years ago: There was ZERO evidence against Gen. Flynn! Here’s how we know the unmasking was suspicious. Bill O’Reilly breaks down just how broken our criminal justice system is. Nancy Pelosi’s new HEROES Act provides amnesty for illegal aliens and aid for pot dealers. Michigan barber Karl Manke returns after having his license suspended to describe the police state-like behavior he’s witnessed. Liberty University president Jerry Falwell Jr. is suing the New York Times for misrepresenting his school’s reopening when in reality, there were NO new cases of coronavirus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
